trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged> event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in virtual mode, and the selection state of a range of items is changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged>事件发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>处于虚拟模式，以及将更改的一系列项的选择状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs> occurs when items are changed from selected to deselected, and deselected to selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs>选择要取消选择，并取消选择为选定项从更改时发生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The `isSelected` parameter indicates the current state of the range of items.
trans-unit.target: `isSelected`参数指示的项的范围的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first item in the range that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 已更改的范围内的第一项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the last item in the range that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 已更改的范围内的最后一项的索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the items are selected; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate the items are deselected.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示选择的项;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>以指示在取消选择项。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index for the last item in the range of items whose selection state has changed
trans-unit.target: 获取其所选内容状态已更改的项的范围中的最后一项的索引

trans-unit.source: The index of the last item in the range of items whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: 选择状态已更改的项的范围中的最后一项的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the range of items is selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否选定的项的范围。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs> occurs when items are changed from selected to deselected, and deselected to selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs>选择要取消选择，并取消选择为选定项从更改时发生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The `isSelected` parameter indicates the current state of the range of items.
trans-unit.target: `isSelected`参数指示的项的范围的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the range of items is selected; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the range of items is deselected.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果选择的项的范围;，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果取消选中的项的范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index for the first item in the range of items whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取其所选内容状态已更改的项的范围中的第一项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first item in the range of items whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: 选择状态已更改的项的范围中的第一项的索引。
